name: portfolio-ai-server
description: Express server for Portfolio AI with Ollama integration

scripts.test-ollama: node -e "fetch('http://127.0.0.1:11434/api/tags').then(r => r.json()).then(d => console.log('Ollama models:', d.models?.map(m => m.name) || [])).catch(e => console.error('Ollama offline:', e.message))"
